details:
node-underscore and libjs-underscore are vulnerable to Arbitrary Code
Execution via the template function, particulary when a variable
property is passed as an argument as it is not sanitized.


For Debian 9 stretch, this problem has been fixed in version
1.8.3~dfsg-1+deb9u1.


We recommend that you upgrade your underscore packages.


For the detailed security status of underscore please refer to
its security tracker page at:
<https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/underscore>


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
